name: MuxBot
description: Professional Telegram mux bot for video processing with terminal access and media tools

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from my.telegram.org

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram User ID (owner of the bot)

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB connection URI (use MongoDB Atlas free tier)

TELEGRAPH_TOKEN.description: Telegraph API token for media info reports

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google Drive Client ID for file uploads

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google Drive Client Secret for file uploads

G_DRIVE_AUTH_TOKEN_DATA.description: Google Drive Auth Token Data for file uploads

G_DRIVE_PARENT_ID.description: Google Drive Parent Folder ID for uploads

G_DRIVE_INDEX_LINK.description: Google Drive Index Link for direct access

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: Telegram Channel ID for logging uploads/downloads

scripts.postdeploy: echo 'Bot deployed successfully. Worker dyno will start automatically.'
